oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch - 1949-09-24 - Part 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch, originally broadcast 1949-09-24 (part 3) over the CBS network. Featuring Gene Autry, Pat Buttram, the Cass County Boys, the Pinafores, Carl Cotner, with announcer Ed Scott. Held at the CBS studios in the Wrigley Building, Chicago, IL. Sponsored by Wrigley's Gum. It is mentioned that Gene Autry is to make an appearance at Madison Square Garden, NY on September 28, 1949.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gene Autry; Cass County Boys; Pinafores; Carl Cotner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Radio play [continued from part 2] -- Gene Autry talks -- Ghost Riders In The Sky (Gene Autry) -- Closing statement (Gene Autry) -- Theme (Back In The Saddle Again) -- Closing statement (Ed Scott) -- Station announcement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Autry, Gene, 1907-1998; Gene Autry's Melody Ranch (Radio program); Cass County Boys (Musical group); Buttram, Pat; Pinafores (Musical group); Cotner, Carl; Scott, Ed (Announcer); CBS Inc.; KRLD (Radio station : Dallas, Tex.);
